SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.protobuf

Class MetricSerializer

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.telemetry.protobuf.MetricSerializer
public final class MetricSerializer extends Object
Serializes metric data to OTLP protobuf format.

The serializer can write directly to a WritableByteChannel for streaming output, or to a ByteBuffer for buffered output.

Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Method Details

    • serialize

      public void serialize(List<MetricData> metrics, String meterName, String meterVersion, WritableByteChannel channel) throws IOException
      Serializes a list of metrics to OTLP MetricsData format, writing to a channel.

      This is the primary serialization method. Data is streamed to the channel as it is serialized.

      Parameters:
      metrics - the metrics to serialize
      meterName - the meter name
      meterVersion - the meter version
      channel - the channel to write to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • serialize

      public ByteBuffer serialize(List<MetricData> metrics, String meterName, String meterVersion) throws IOException
      Serializes a list of metrics to OTLP MetricsData format, returning a ByteBuffer.

      Convenience method for callers who need buffered output.

      Parameters:
      metrics - the metrics to serialize
      meterName - the meter name
      meterVersion - the meter version
      Returns:
      a ByteBuffer containing the serialized metrics (ready for reading)
      Throws:
      IOException - if serialization fails

    • serialize

      public void serialize(Meter meter, AggregationTemporality temporality, WritableByteChannel channel) throws IOException
      Serializes metrics from a single meter, writing to a channel.
      Parameters:
      meter - the meter
      temporality - the aggregation temporality
      channel - the channel to write to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • serialize

      public ByteBuffer serialize(Meter meter, AggregationTemporality temporality) throws IOException
      Serializes metrics from a single meter, returning a ByteBuffer.
      Parameters:
      meter - the meter
      temporality - the aggregation temporality
      Returns:
      a ByteBuffer containing the serialized metrics (ready for reading)
      Throws:
      IOException - if serialization fails
